title: "Machine learning algorithm could provide Soldiers feedback"
excerpt: "A new machine learning algorithm, developed with Army funding, can isolate patterns in brain signals that relate to a specific behavior and then decode it, potentially providing Soldiers with behavioral-based feedback."
